TEXT.TITLE: WEDGESTONE REALTY <WDG> ISSUES WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: Wedgestone Realty Investors Trust said it has issued institutional investors 10-year warrants to buy 575,000 shares at 16.50 dlrs each in connection with the previously-announced sale of 10-year promissory notes to the investors. It said the exercise price of the warrants may be reduced and the number of shares increased in certain circumstances. Reuter
